content:
# After harvesting from the Coal patch, I now have 10 units of Coal in my inventory. This indicates that I can proceed to refuel the Stone Furnace.

# I will now insert 5 units of Coal into the Stone Furnace to ensure it has enough fuel to smelt the Iron Ore.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 units of Coal into the furnace.

# After this insertion, I will check the status of the Stone Furnace again to ensure it is operational and smelting the Iron Ore.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)  # Inspect the furnace inventory after insertion.
current_status = stone_furnace_entity.status  # Get the current status of the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Stone Furnace Inventory after adding Coal: {furnace_inventory}")  # Display contents of the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Current status of the Stone Furnace after adding Coal: {current_status}")  # Display current status after inserting fuel.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Checking the state of entities after the action.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Final check on the inventory.
